aboutPage.title: About HypeHaat
aboutPage.subtitle: We are passionate about bringing you the best products that blend technology, style, and functionality.
aboutPage.missionText: Our mission is to provide an unparalleled shopping experience by offering a curated selection of high-quality products, exceptional customer service, and a seamless online platform. We believe in innovation, quality, and putting our customers first.
aboutPage.storyText: Founded in 2023, HypeHaat started as a small project by a group of tech enthusiasts who wanted to share their passion with the world. We've grown into a trusted online retailer, but our core values of quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction remain the same. We are dedicated to helping you find products that enhance your life.
aboutPage.qualityText: We handpick and test every product to ensure it meets our high standards of quality and durability.
aboutPage.shippingText: We offer fast and reliable shipping to get your new favorite items to you as quickly as possible.
aboutPage.supportText: Our friendly support team is here to help you with any questions or issues you may have.

adminImportPage.howItWorksText: For security reasons, our AI cannot visit external links. Instead, it intelligently analyzes the text within the URL you provide to understand the product type. It then creatively generates brand new, realistic product data (name, description, images, price) for you to review and add to your store.
